mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.name AS name, c.nickname AS nickname, p.title AS title, p.content AS content, p.idx AS postIdx, m.id AS mapId, m.place_name AS placeName, (SELECT file_name FROM file WHERE post_idx = p.idx) AS fileName FROM member c , post p , map m WHERE 1=1 AND c.id = p.member_id AND p.map_id = m.id AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY p.idx

SELECT idx AS idx, title AS title, content AS content, map_id AS mapId, place_name AS placeName, (SELECT file_name FROM file f WHERE post_idx = p.idx) AS fileName, b.id AS memberId, b.name AS memberName FROM post p, map m, member b WHERE p.map_id = m.id AND p.member_id = b.id AND p.idx = #{idx}
